tool_description: Estimates energy consumption and operating costs for selected appliances based on usage patterns and local utility rates.

appliance_models.description: Array of appliance models to analyze

electricity_rate.description: Local electricity rate per kWh in USD

gas_rate.description: Local gas rate per therm in USD

error_messages: Invalid utility rates: Electricity and gas rates must be positive numbers
Invalid usage frequency: Use light, moderate, or heavy
Invalid household size: Must be between 1 and 10 people
Appliance energy data missing: Energy consumption data not available for some models
usage: Input appliance models, utility rates, and usage patterns to get estimated annual energy costs and consumption.

annual_electricity_cost.description: Estimated annual electricity cost in USD

annual_gas_cost.description: Estimated annual gas cost in USD

total_annual_cost.description: Total estimated annual energy cost in USD

energy_efficiency_rating.description: Overall energy efficiency rating of appliance set
